**PR Reviewer Checklist**

*Code*
- [ ] Readability (naming matters)
- [ ] DRY
- [ ] short methods
- [ ] Single Responsibility (classes & methods)
- [ ] scalability / efficiency

*Definition of Done*
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Security

*Quality Assurance*
- [ ] Unit tests (created, updated)
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] End-to-end tests
